about.title: About Me
about.intro: Student in Master of Science in Digital Technology at Epitech Lyon, specialized in web development with PHP/Symfony/React and data analytics (BI/Analytics).
about.desc: With expertise in backend development (PHP, Symfony), frontend (React, TypeScript) and data analytics (Python, SQL, BI), I'm actively looking for an internship to contribute to data-driven projects and apply my technical skills.
